name: 2-3 years and forget
description: 23 is a cultural and community-driven project built around discipline, long-term thinking, and collective creativity. The number 23 represents a mindset: committing to a 2â€“3 year journey of growth rather than chasing short-term speculation. Inspired by the idea of training, patience, and self-improvement, the project encourages holders to build and contribute through art, memes, stories, and community initiatives. 23 aims to create an identity and movement where participants shape the culture together, allowing the number to spread organically across platforms and real-world spaces. The project focuses on sustained participation, community expression, and a long-term decentralized vision rather than short-lived hype.
